title: Tonto National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be A Junior Ranger         Become a Junior Ranger at Tonto NM! NPS photo  Become a Junior Ranger at Tonto National Monument!  There are four Junior Ranger programs to choose from; ask for a booklet at the visitor center front desk when you arrive. You can earn all four Junior Ranger awards during your visit!    Tonto National Monument Junior Ranger Program To earn the monument's Junior Ranger badge, complete 6 activities for your age group.     Centennial Junior Ranger Program Help us celebrate the National Park Service's 100th birthday by becoming a centennial junior ranger! To earn this badge, attend a ranger-led activity or watch the film, hike to the Lower Cliff Dwelling, and complete the required amount of activities for your age group. This program is available for a limited time only!   Â      Visit four other NPS sites in Arizona to earn this patch. NPS photo   Arizona Archeologist Junior Ranger Program To earn this patch, you need to visit four National Park Service units in Arizona. You will need to complete the park's activity page and get a ranger signature during your visit.  Historic Preservation Junior Ranger Program Learn about the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 and commemorate it's 50th anniversary. To earn this badge, you need to complete the required amount of activities for your age group.    Not able to visit us? Become a National Park Service Web Ranger instead!
